originalText.text:
DO NOT come here

My biggest health problem is my eyes. I came here with trust that these people will care for my eyes but I was so WRONG.

When ever I visit Dr. Kim he just quickly look at my eyes & quickly leaves without telling me any of his findings, concern, et, or answering just 1-2 questions I have.

If I try tell him my vision or eye health doesnt seem right and Im concern of it health he just tell me quickly oh just come back next time noting wrong with your eyes. If I even try ask him any question at all also just 1 or 2 he seem have no interest in answering and he juat keep saying just come back next time & he quickly leaves. This is how he been treating me for 5-6 visits having absolutely no interest.

Due to this, my vision had got very bad and yet Dr. Kim still has no interest in answering my 1-2 questions or eye health, he keeps saying just come back time and he just quickly leaves.

I than stop coming here due to his rude offending behavior & went to a better eye place where they actually care of my NOW bad eye health and answer all my questions or concerns.

Im going report Dr. Kim for patient maltreatment it  all because of him my vision got WORSE but he keep saying noting wrong with my eyes come back next time & he quickly leaves. If noting wromg than why did the better eye place I went to said their  is something wrong with my eyes and giving me treatment? Dr. Kim just a liar who dont care about you.

Save your eyesight and go to a better place. Not this place where Dr. Kim doesnt even care about you or your eye health. & your eyesight will just get worse.

Regret coming here.

originalText.text: Dr.Kim is an amazing doctor but the front desk are rude especially the one with blonde hair Mercedez that lady and the manager they do not know how to work with others

originalText.text: These people call you to remind you of your appointment and to be on time.  But they do not call you to tell you that there staff did not show for work and are running behind with a practice that does not provide seating for a backlog of patients.  I hate a practice the does not value its clients time and value.  Not cool.....

originalText.text: The receptionist attitude and approach towards minor  mistakes like signing the wrong log in is disgusting. Never understood the concept of making a career out of something you clearly dont enjoy. To make matters worse there was no where to sit. I ended up walking out, best choice i made.

originalText.text: Do not come here. Horrible customer service. I looked to get a second opinion elsewhere and was denied the retrieval of MY medical records. First, they wanted $0.75 per page and apparently it was "a lot". I am never coming back. Now nothing. Outrageous!
